name: Bloom
text: Upon completion of the ritual, you cause all outdoor terrain within 20 squares of you to bloom with new growth and foliage. The entire area becomes difficult terrain. Alternatively, the ritual causes crops and fruit-bearing plants within 20 squares of you to yield food. The plants produce enough food to feed five people for a week.
flavorText: Grass grows, trees bear fruit, and the landâ€™s bounty is available to all.
